comment: Osamba spent years blaming Bush for bad economy, now he has spent years taking credit for success in the economy. What do we call this?

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / spend-02
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Osamba"))
            :ARG1 (m2 / multiple
                  :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                        :quant 1
                        :unit (y / year)))
            :ARG2 (b / blame-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Bush"))
                  :ARG2 (e / economy
                        :ARG1-of (b2 / bad-07))))
      :snt2 (s2 / spend-02
            :ARG0 (h / he)
            :ARG1 (m3 / multiple
                  :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                        :quant 1
                        :unit (y2 / year)))
            :ARG2 (t3 / take-01
                  :ARG0 h
                  :ARG1 (c / credit-01
                        :ARG1 h
                        :ARG2 (s3 / succeed-01
                              :ARG0 h
                              :ARG1 (e2 / economy))))
            :time (n3 / now))
      :snt3 (c2 / call-01
            :ARG0 (w / we)
            :ARG1 (t4 / this)
            :ARG2 (a / amr-unknown)))
